name: Exploration Experience Prototype (Project 3, 2018)
description:
Prototype for Project 3, codename Exploration Experience.

Development log

Instructions

Walk around objects, fly around objects, take pictures.

Browse the pictures on the computer. (Toggle the free cursor to be able to press the buttons)

Land on an object by stopping and hovering over its surface for a bit.

Controls on ground

WASD - move around
Space - Start flying

Controls in air

WS - Accelerate forward/backward
AD - Roll

Space - Move up
Ctrl - Move down

Misc controls

C - Toggle free cursor
F - Take a picture

Issues

Unity WebGL doesn't handle MeshColliders well. It is not possible to land on the starting area again after flying. The donuts work well though.
